item.title: [Class Suggestion] Tomb Raider
item.dc:creator: Justforfun
item.description:
Tomb Raider

Unique Neutral Support

Passive (The Curse of the dead) - All infinite night abilities are restricted to 3 uses.

Passive (Bounty Acquired) - Gain dead player’s passive from lastest Raid Tomb ability.

Day Ability (Raid Tomb) - Target a dead non-unique, non-neutral class and replace with that player’s night abilities and classes. You may choose the converted version. The result is adjusted to what you selected. [ The same body cannot be retargeted] (3 uses)

Day Ability (Inspect Tomb) - At the end of the night, learn what classes killed a player, or if they committed suicide. (3 uses)

Night Ability (Gossip) - See the feedback of abilities used on target player. Will not receive feedback for conversion, attacks or Evil Support abilities that reveal the person as evil. (3 uses)

Night Ability (Neut Matters) - Determine if a player is a member of the Neutral faction (3 uses)

** Goal: Win with the majority class of raided tomb or Neutral Killer**

Win conditions are as follows:

  • Raid 2 BD and 1 Cult/Unseen tombs = Win with BD or Neutral Killer

  • Raid 1 BD and 2 Cult/Unseen tombs = Win with Cult/Unseen or Neutral Killer

  • Raid 1 BD tomb only = Win with BD or Neutral Killer

  • Raid 1 Cult/Unseen tomb only = Win with Cult/Unseen or Neutral Killer

  • Raid 1 BD and 1 Cult/Unseen tombs = Lose

  • No Raid Tomb = Lose
